_header: Gaude felix Anna the mother of Mary
Title(s): Salutacio in honore sancte Anne matris marie
_description: John Audelay, Salutacio in honore sancte Anne matris marie, with Gaude anaphora — six quatrains

BodDou302.First Lines:
Gaude felix anna þe moder of MariGaude þou
                    broȝtis forþ þat borþ þat al þe word con
                    glade…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…Gaude þis salutacion to þe here we
                        sayGaude þou graunt vs of þi grace to haue
                    remyssioun
BodDou302.Attributed Title:
Quicumque hanc salutacionem in honore Sancte Anne matris Marie cotidie
                        deuote dixerit sine dubio mala morte non morietur (f.
                    27rb)
BodDou302.Editions:
Whiting,  Ella Keats,
                        ed.  
             John Audelay: The Poems.
EETS
         o.s. 184 (1931); repr. 1988: 178-9.
